Ancient Civilizations.name: Echoes of the Cradle: Southern Africa's Legacy
Ancient Civilizations.description: Delve into the history of Southern Africa, exploring the rise and fall of empires and the rich tapestry of its mythology. This quiz tests your knowledge of the Zulu, Xhosa, and other influential groups that shaped the region.

questions.text: What native empire controlled Large areas of South African Territory during the 19th century?
questions.hint: This empire was known for its warrior culture under leaders like Shaka.

questions.text: Who was the mother of the Greek god Zeus?
questions.hint: This Titaness hid Zeus from his father, Cronus, to save him.

questions.text: According to Greek mythology, who was Apollo's twin sister?
questions.hint: She is a goddess associated with the moon and hunting.

Ancient Civilizations.name: Andean Ascent: Lords of the Mountains
Ancient Civilizations.description: Journey to the heart of the Andes and uncover the secrets of the Inca civilization. This quiz explores their impressive engineering, complex social structure, and ultimate downfall at the hands of the Spanish.

questions.text: What people ruled the Andes Mountains until they were conquered by the Spanish in 1532?
questions.hint: This civilization built Machu Picchu and was known for its gold.

questions.text: What is the name of the mountain where the mythological Greek gods live?
questions.hint: This mountain is the highest in Greece and home to Zeus and other deities.

questions.text: In what war did Joan of Arc fight?
questions.hint: This conflict lasted over a century, involving England and France.
